metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1633 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A credentials leak flaw was found in OpenStack Barbican. This flaw allows a local authenticated attacker to read the configuration file, gaining access to sensitive credentials.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-10-26, no details if this is a Red Hat specific issue or if it also applies to Debian/Ubuntu, see Red Hat bug

criterions.comment: barbican package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-10-26').
